line.comment: * Cannot claim in the first 10 minutes.
* Cannot claim an already claimed sector.
* Cannot claim a sector we own.
* Cannot claim a protectorate.
* Cannot claim if the player did not finish his Ascension (t-file option).
* Cannot claim a sector if we have a truce with the owner.
* Cannot claim a sector if we have a coalition with the owner.
* At this point, Player can claim everything.
* === NPC Only below. ===
* Make sure only main factions can claim $sector.
* Cannot claim a sector if we have an unbreakable alliance with the owner.
* Cannot claim Xenon sectors if they're weaker than originally.
* Cannot claim an Unknown sector while the Player has not captured any.
* Weak empires have less restrictions. (removed by SWM3)
* if $nbSectors > 4
* Cannot claim more Unknown Sectors than the Player owns + X depending on $galaxy.age; except if we're in the OCV stage.
* large player empire removes all restrictions (fix from M3R included in SWM3)
* end
* Cannot claim an Unknown sector if there are not much left in the galaxy, except if we're in OCV stage. (3.11: removed)
* if $galaxyProgress < 3
* if $sector.owner == [Unknown]
* $unknownSectors = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.GetOwnedSectors' : race=[Unknown] randomize=[FALSE]
* $unknownSectors.s = size of array $unknownSectors
* do if $unknownSectors <= 4
* return [FALSE]
* end
* end
* Cannot claim Player sectors if the reputation is not bad.
* Cannot claim an occupied sector we know nothing about.
* if $sector.owner != [Unknown]
* skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsMonitored' : objectOrSector=$sector race=$race
* return [FALSE]
* end
* Cannot claim a sector if the owner has less than or equal to X sectors (9972 option).
* SWM3 allows the Empire to wipe the Rebels out (9973 option)
* SWM3 phase 3 eventually starts a total war between New Republic and Empire and removes the annihilation limit for them
* Republic has higher annihilationLimit but only before Clone Wars (Mando arrival)
* Rebels always have higher annihilationLimit
* Don't claim if we have Pacifism favor.
* SWM3 don't claim any more sectors if the game is not in phase 3 yet and we already own 40% of the galaxy
* Mandos can still attack the player if he rejects them in the quest!

sval.val: Вознесение
Cannot claim in the first 10 minutes.
Cannot claim an already claimed sector.
Cannot claim a sector we own.
Cannot claim a protectorate.
Cannot claim if the player did not finish his Ascension (t-file option).
Cannot claim a sector if we have a truce with the owner.
Cannot claim a sector if we have a coalition with the owner.
At this point, Player can claim everything.
=== NPC Only below. ===
Make sure only main factions can claim $sector.
Cannot claim a sector if we have an unbreakable alliance with the owner.
Cannot claim Xenon sectors if they're weaker than originally.
Cannot claim an Unknown sector while the Player has not captured any.
Weak empires have less restrictions. (removed by SWM3)
if $nbSectors > 4
Cannot claim more Unknown Sectors than the Player owns + X depending on $galaxy.age; except if we're in the OCV stage.
large player empire removes all restrictions (fix from M3R included in SWM3)
Cannot claim an Unknown sector if there are not much left in the galaxy, except if we're in OCV stage. (3.11: removed)
if $galaxyProgress < 3
if $sector.owner == [Unknown]
$unknownSectors = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.GetOwnedSectors' : race=[Unknown] randomize=[FALSE]
$unknownSectors.s = size of array $unknownSectors
do if $unknownSectors <= 4
return [FALSE]
Cannot claim Player sectors if the reputation is not bad.
Cannot claim an occupied sector we know nothing about.
if $sector.owner != [Unknown]
skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsMonitored' : objectOrSector=$sector race=$race
return [FALSE]
Cannot claim a sector if the owner has less than or equal to X sectors (9972 option).
SWM3 allows the Empire to wipe the Rebels out (9973 option)
SWM3 phase 3 eventually starts a total war between New Republic and Empire and removes the annihilation limit for them
Republic has higher annihilationLimit but only before Clone Wars (Mando arrival)
Rebels always have higher annihilationLimit
Don't claim if we have Pacifism favor.
SWM3 don't claim any more sectors if the game is not in phase 3 yet and we already own 40% of the galaxy
Mandos can still attack the player if he rejects them in the quest!
